thank you Nikita200, but still cant get the keygen to work on windows 7 64bit. Also I cannot disable DEP. Pls help me.

Open a command prompt as administrator:

bcdedit.exe /set {current} nx AlwaysOff

Then:

bcdedit.exe /set {current} nx AlwaysOn
